pages.text: You designed the Crystallarieum with Budding Blocks in mind: an ink-powered apparatus, which could automatically grow resources from raw ore or crystals on it's top.$(br)While, even after all your efforts, you could not get it to grow actual $(l:general/shards)Gemstone Shards$(/l), you quickly recognised it's potential for growing all kinds of other resources.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: It can fit a few stacks of catalysts, which it uses to enhance the growth process. For a few rare materials that even seems required.
